hanzi-su-wiki:
渓

Значения

Ущелье, лощина

Мнемоника

В китайском языке знак имеет значение «ручей, горный поток». Разве 奚 вода 氵 — это ручей? В японском языке — лощина.

Варианты

溪, 谿, 磎
purpleculture_pinyin:
xī
Japanese variant of 溪
Японский вариант ручья
rtega_mnemonic:
溪溪RS
渓渓		𧮾mountain stream, creek
  • servant 奚 water 氵 of a big stream
  • modf. 溪 → 渓
heisig_constituent: mountain stream, water, water droplets, water pistol, claw, vulture, husband
koohiiStory1: The Simpsons are on vacation. Homer stops to take a leak in a mountain stream but gets snatched by an eagle. Hear his scream?
koohiiStory2: A husband who went fishing at the mountain stream to feed his family, fell in the rapids (we´ll assume this is a large mountain stream). He is saved from the waters by a great eagle. He comes back home with nothing to feed the family, his clothes still dripping wet as he tells his wife of how he was saved by a great eagle, and of course she does not believe him. The story continues in chicken (#1947).
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: The tsunami swept away one of the cleats your husband just bought and creates an entire valley with it.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Watch as the tsunami rakes your husband's cleat across the mountain, carving a valley and an easier path for itself. Nature is brutal.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: When the water clears, you and your husband go to the valley to look for the cleat and instead you find a bunch of cake (けい)! Maybe this is the tsunami's way of saying, "Thanks for letting me steal your cleat so I could make this valley shortcut."
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Imagine yourself eating cake with your husband in this newly formed valley. You both agree that this should be called Cake Valley!
Ru_Notes: Не путать: 淫 (ひたす、みだれる、イン распутство, разврат).

Radicals: 氵, 夫  (tsunami, husband, cleat)
Meaning Mnemonic
The tsunami swept away one of the cleats your husband just bought and creates an entire valley with it.
Watch as the tsunami rakes your husband's cleat across the mountain, carving a valley and an easier path for itself. Nature is brutal.
Reading Mnemonic
When the water clears, you and your husband go to the valley to look for the cleat and instead you find a bunch of cake (けい)! Maybe this is the tsunami's way of saying, "Thanks for letting me steal your cleat so I could make this valley shortcut."
Imagine yourself eating cake with your husband in this newly formed valley. You both agree that this should be called Cake Valley!
